mapper.select: select * from chatroom r, chatlist l, carry c, member m where l.cridx=c.cridx and m.memidx=l.memidx and r.messageidx = (SELECT MAX(r.MESSAGEIDX) from chatroom r where r.chatidx = l.chatidx and m.memidx=#{memidx}) group by r.chatidx;
select * from chatlist l join carry c on l.cridx=c.cridx join member m on l.memidx=m.memidx and m.memidx=#{memidx};

select * from chatroom r, chatlist l, carry c, member m where l.cridx=c.cridx and m.memidx=l.memidx and r.messageidx = (SELECT MAX(r.MESSAGEIDX) from chatroom r where r.chatidx = l.chatidx and c.cridx=#{cridx}) group by r.chatidx;
select * from chatlist l join carry c on l.cridx=c.cridx join member m on l.memidx=m.memidx and c.cridx=#{cridx};
select cridx, crnick, placename from carry
select chatidx from chatlist where cridx=#{cridx} and memidx=#{memidx}
select count(*) from chatlist where chatidx=#{param}

select * from chatroom r, chatlist l, carry c, member m where l.cridx=c.cridx and m.memidx=l.memidx and r.messageidx = (SELECT MAX(r.MESSAGEIDX) from chatroom r where r.chatidx = l.chatidx and m.memidx=#{memidx}) group by r.chatidx;
mapper.insert: insert into chatroom (chatidx, chatcontent, cridx, memidx, contenttype) values (#{chatidx},#{chatcontent},#{cridx},#{memidx},#{contenttype})
mapper.update: update chatroom set chatread=1 where chatidx=#{chatidx};
